amendment.description: Amendment makes eligibility for U.S. assistance toward eventual NATO membership subject to presidential discretion for the nations of the former Soviet Union and Yugoslavia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 9 as printed in the Congressional Record) to make eligibility for U.S. assistance toward eventual NATO membership subject to presidential discretion for the nations of the former Soviet Union and Yugoslavia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bateman amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
